v8:item.v8:content: User name for background job execution.
Date and time when the last background job completed.
Show background jobs that completed with errors.
Show background jobs, that were canceled by a user.
Show background jobs, that are currently executing.
Repeat if error occured after, sec
Unique ID of the last background job
Count of background jobs in table
This field is required for algorithm of settings saving
Background job IDs for manual execution
Update the list of scheduled and background jobs (taking the filter into account).
Start separate client session to execute scheduled jobs.
Execute scheduled job procedure either in this session (for file mode), or in background job on server (for client/server mode).
